drug.name: Pilsicainide
drug.description: Pilsicainide has been investigated for the treatment of Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation.

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as beta amino acids and derivatives. These are amino acids having a (-NH2) group attached to the beta carbon atom.
